basicInfo.name: Babel
basicInfo.flavor: Babel turned blue after killing mages and stealing their magic. They say Babel resembles a ghost in the darkest part of the mine.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Sonic Wave
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 170% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack.

profile.story:
Babels are a species of bat monster native to Silent Mine.
They attack people and drain them of their magic.
This magic gives them an eerie blue glow, leading many to believe that they're ghosts.
The bats used to follow Babel into territorial fights against Syllops and Cellops and the spiders.
However, both the bats and spiders were conquered by the orcs, so these fights have become a thing of the past.
Now that the orcs have been conquered by Eileene, both the bats and spiders have chosen to fall in line behind her.

basicInfo.name: Babel
basicInfo.flavor: Using his sharp teeth, Babel feeds on lost adventurers in Silent Mine and grows even more powerful.
